item.title: Using Hugo
item.description: I’m giving the blogging thing another try and this time I will be using a static site generator, specifically Hugo. I like that it’s written in Go for performance and is otherwise pretty easy to use.

item.title: About /dev/klog
item.description: My name is Jean-Fran√ßois Roy, and I’m one of the lead graphics infrastructure engineer on Stadia. I go by “JF”. /dev/klog is my blog, where I mostly post about things related to graphics and systems programming, but sometimes other things too (like üö¥‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è).

item.title: Resume
item.description: I am a self-motivated software engineer specialized in systems and tools design, and real-time computer graphics. I love crafting high performance software that delights and surprises developers and end-users. Experience Staff software engineer at Google, LLC. 2013 ‚Äì present Working on Stadia. Designing and implementing the graphics infrastructure, including drivers, tools, APIs, monitoring, testing. Cross-functional work with video coding, virtualization, build engineering, fleet management, platform micro-services, and developer UX.
